NAME: Pattana Deshanawa - Rev Kiriwaththuduwe Ariyadassaa Thero
Ven Polgahawela Mithabhani himi - Achelapa Kashapa Thero
Pragna Wimuktha - Ven Kandegedara Sobitha Thero
Ven Doloswala Udithadeera Thero - Sathdarma Sagara
Ven Munnakulame Dammanada Thero - Jathika pothen Jeewitha pothata
Ven Pannala Dammisara Thero - Jathika pothen Jeewitha pothata
Ven Halmillakulame Sujathagnana Thero - Sadhaham Thakshalawa
Ven Koralayagama Saranathissa Thero - Dhamma Nadeethitha Deshana
Ven Radhawadunne Gnanawimala Thero - Akurata Peramaga
Ven Kurunagala Dammanada Thero - Darmanu Lokanaya
Ven Higure Pannasekara Thero - Nibbanthi Deera
Ven Thapowanaye Ariyadaja Thero - Chakkugn Udapadhi
Ven Neelam Mahara Chathura Shantha Thero
